text.autoconfig.autoclicker-fabric.optio: If enabled, it will use the options below to determine how to auto click

When enabled, the key will be pressed then unpressed,
you can control how quickly this happens below.

When 'spamming' is enabled, this setting will determine
how many ticks are between each click, 0 = off, 1+ = 1 tick of delay.

When enabled, if a mob is detected, the button will be
tapped in respect to the cooldown of the attack.

(Must have 'Respect Cooldown' enabled). When enabled,
the button will be clicked when a mob is in direct line of sight.

(Must have 'Respect Cooldown' enabled). When enabled,
the button will be clicked when a crop is in direct line of sight.
Hold attack button down for N ticks after seeing last crop.
Do NOT attack any of these entities (blocks or mobs)
If enabled, it will use the options below to determine how to auto click

When enabled, the key will be pressed then unpressed,
you can control how quickly this happens below.

When 'spamming' is enabled, this setting will determine
how many ticks are between each click, 0 = off, 1+ = 1 tick of delay.
